tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She is very friendly and treatment is painless. Fully dedicated to her job.Full satisfaction.Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi! I would highly recommend Dr. Adarsha Kannan who is excellent in her treatment. Her friendly and smiling face puts you at ease when you walk in to the clean clinic fulfilling all requirements according to Covid SOP. She listens to all your fears and then explains the entire process patiently and reassures that its going to be fine.  My complete treatment was totally hassle free and painless. She has an excellent team who coordinate very well. 
I can clearly say I went in to the clinic to Meet Dr, Adarsha Kannan crying and frightened but came out smiling and reassured and happy. Thankyou Dr. Adarsha Kannan for taking care of my  problem and sorting it out so efficiently with for bearing with me and my fear.      :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Post and Core,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Aesthetic Dentistry,
review: I went to  Dr. Adarsha  for several teeth problems as I was a Tobacco/ paan user . I was afraid to smile or even open my mouth in front of the public,.  Never thought I will be able to have my smile  and confidence  back again.  She is very professional in her approach and explains the whole process and the costs involved.  So  I had various options to choose from within my budget.  Her dentistry skills are amazing and I will 200%  recommend Dr. Adarsha for her expertise *** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had shown my wife to few dentists before but they were unable to identify the issue and they said that everything looks normal, but the pain remained. So had to find out some experienced doctor and this is where Dr. Adarsha's experience worked. She was able to identify the issue and provide suitable treatment. Its been months and my wife is not experiencing anymore pain. Thanks for your expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My daughter Kriti is no more afraid of the dentist. She has teeth that demands constant dental care, glad we found Dr Aadarsha... she is very patient and explains the condition in a detailed manner, very highly skilled and great with children... can't thank you enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was a bit sceptic for booking a dental appointment during this COVID crisis, but was super delighted with the preparation for the appointment in the clinic.
 Dr. Kannan was very professional , and explained my case very throughly, and was very forthcoming in the treatment plan discussion.

tags: Wait time,
review:
I went to Mint Dental as my previous filling had fallen off, there was absolutely no pain in the tooth. Dr. Adarsha recommended I go for a RCT . After 2 sittings and temp filling the pain started again and never went away even after placing the permanent filling, so the filling had to be removed, and redone again. It took almost 12 visits in total and almost 3 months for something that stared as a benign filling fall out and was quite painful.

The facilty is very clean, doctors are mostly professional but they say a great dental procedure is one that is as quick and painless as possible. Unfortunately my experience was neither quick nor painless.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Explanation of the issue until further treatment was carried out well. Dr. Adarsha and Dr Kajal treated me and guided me during and post treatment. Though the process of Root Canal itself is tedious and painful but they ensured that everything was perfect and no room for doubt on procedure. The cost of the artificial crown was high based on my choice, however there are other varieties that are available for cheaper, the choice depends on the tooth position and aesthetics. I would recommend them as Dr. Adarsha is a very senior professional having held esteemed positions across various major hospitals and trust that is built up over period of time.
The clinic is relatively new and neat with all procedures of disinfection carried out based on COVID guidelines.

reply_text: It was a real treat to my entire team treating a cheerful person like you with tremendous patience..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Adarsha is a highly experienced and friendly doctor with in-depth knowledge of the dental issue . I consulted her for my father's dental issue. She explained every detail so well !! Would highly recommend her to anyone who is looking for an experienced doc with a good hand. The clinic is v neat and clean meticulously following all covid protection protocols.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for bleeding gum issue. they told for cleaning. I told them to do cleaning as suggested by her. still I have bleeding problem *** ***** ***** *** ******** **** ******* * *** ** ******* ** ***** ****** very bad experience, we go to doctor to overcome our health problem. *** **** ******* ***** **** ****** *** ******* *********
reply_text:
Dear patient
Bleeding gums happens due to tartar deposits in between  gums and teeth, ie; above and below the gum line.If one doesn't visit a dentist for professional cleaning on time,every six months,the deposits gets further accumulated which releases irritants to the gums and the gums starts getting inflammed and starts receding and pulling away from the teeth and the gums eventually starts bleeding...when you delay your visit for cleaning by any dental professional including us, the damage has already happened to your gums and bones supporting the gums.While scaling)cleaning we remove the irritant/the tartar deposit which is stuck between the teeth and gums which is more or less like a cement in between bricks...Tartar deposits are always more in between front teeth due to accumulation of saliva in front part of our mouth.Calcium in our saliva ,mixes with plaque and gets deposited as a white/green coloured powdery cement which is called as tartar)calculus...
When we remove it during professional scaling the area occupied by  tartar in between the teeth is cleared and thus gap appears between teeth....after scaling, 50 percent of gum recession gets repaired in due course of time,but whatever damage has happened due to delay in treatment on time remains.
All these aspects are thoroughly explained to all our patients before the procedure.

tags: Value for money,
review: The wisdom tooth extraction cost is  very high, we had got an estimation of half of the amount at the time of consultation but while doing it ..the bill was made as  just doubled . And the extraction was non surgerical. Not happy with the pricing rest ok.
reply_text: The estimate submitted to the patient at the time of consultation and the amount charged after the procedure was the same . Probably there would've been a case of misunderstanding while communication as it was very clearly explained to the patient that the upper and lower wisdom tooth would be extracted and all the patients are charged the same for surgical extractions.The extraction was done surgically as the tooth was impacted within bone, the proof of which can be submitted in the form of IOPA xray of the wisdom tooth taken during consultation.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Although appoinment was there doctor mentioned first day consultation and second day treat.ent for a small issue which is not acceptable. Also they asked for xray for such small evident thing.
reply_text:
When appointments are scheduled already for patients who are undergoing treatment at our clinic  we don't conduct treatment for a first time consult patient unless the patient specifically asks for a one hour slot while booking the appointment.If we are free at that point in time with no other appointments ,we do the treatment during the consultation visit itself. 
An xray is taken to diagnose an issue when a patient complains of pain in a teeth which has been filled incorrectly elsewhere.
